About

I’m Abhishek Singh, an 18-year-old high school student in India.

In my free time, you can find me programming, speedcubing or playing the guitar. Maybe all of those together.

If you like to watch Silicon Valley, we’re instant best-friends.

Here are a few books I love.

  • Slaughterhouse-Five by Kurt Vonnegut
  • Steve Jobs by Walter Isaacson
  • Moonwalking with Einstein by Joshua Foer
  • Beacon 23 by Hugh Howey
  • The Soul of A New Machine by Tracy Kidder
